repairedDockerfile:
from centos:7 
ENV PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/boutiques/tools 
RUN yum update -y && \  
yum install -y gcc \  
make \  
python-setuptools \  
ruby \  
ruby-devel && \
mkdir /usr/local/boutiques && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
COPY tools /usr/local/boutiques/tools/ 
COPY schema /usr/local/boutiques/schema/ 

# Install validator and invocation schema 
RUN cd /usr/local/boutiques/tools && \  
gem install bundler && \  
bundle install && \  
easy_install pip && \
 pip install --no-cache-dir jsonschema
